pkgmetadata.longdescription: # tabcompleter (ðŸ“ƒ) [![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/tabcompleter.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/tabcompleter)**[tabcompleter](https://github.com/mdmintz/tabcompleter)** is a friendly fork of the (unmaintained) [fancycompleter](https://github.com/pdbpp/fancycompleter) package.**``tabcompleter``** lets you use the **Tab** key to expand and autocomplete options in the Python console.### Installation:```bashpip install tabcompleter```### Usage:```pythonimport tabcompletertabcompleter.interact(persist_history=True)# Now use the Tab key in the Python console```An example of using the **Tab** key to see all possibilities:### More examples:**``tabcompleter``** is used by packages such as ``pdbp`` and ``seleniumbase``:* https://pypi.org/project/pdbp/* https://github.com/mdmintz/pdbp* https://pypi.org/project/seleniumbase/* https://github.com/seleniumbase/SeleniumBase----------------(**``tabcompleter``** is maintained by the [SeleniumBase Dev Team](https://github.com/seleniumbase/SeleniumBase))
